eli5-content-lang: Tap on anything to explain it to me.
multiple-choice-correct-answer: Great job! Your answer is correct.
success-try-next-activity: Great job! Try the next activity!
answers-submitted: Your answers have been submitted to your teacher!
correct-answer: Great job! Your answer is correct.
fill-in-the-blank-not-complete: Please fill all fields. ${unfilledCount} blank left.
sorting-not-complete: Please place all words in categories before submitting. (${cardsPlaced}/${totalCards} words placed)
sorting-results: You have ${correctCount} correct answers and ${incorrectCount} incorrect answers. Try Again?
sorting-correct-answer: Great job! Your answer is correct.
matching-correct-answers-count: You have ${correctCount} correct answers. Try again.
glossary-no-terms-filter: No glossary terms found. Clear filter to view all terms.
tutorial-step-1-content: Through this button you can access the chapters and exercises of the book.
tutorial-step-2-content: Use the arrows to navigate through the different pages of the book.
tutorial-step-3-content:

tutorial-welcome-announcement: Welcome to this book in its accessible format. Keyboard shortcuts available: Alt plus Shift plus arrows to navigate between pages, Alt plus Shift plus A to open and close the accessibility menu, Alt plus Shift plus X to open and close navigation. A brief tutorial will guide you through the available functions.
tutorial-closed-announcement: Tutorial closed. Remember you can use Alt plus Shift plus A to open and close the accessibility menu, Alt plus Shift plus arrows to navigate between pages, and Alt plus Shift plus X to open and close the navigation menu. You can access more accessibility functions with the button in the right corner.
tutorial-starting-announcement: Starting tutorial. First step: how to use the navigation menu. Remember you can use Alt plus Shift plus Z to open and close the navigation menu.
tutorial-completed-announcement: Tutorial completed. Remember you can use Alt plus Shift plus A to open and close the accessibility menu, Alt plus Shift plus arrows to navigate between pages, and Alt plus Shift plus X to open and close the navigation menu.
tutorial-welcome-title: Welcome to the accessible digital textbook
tutorial-description-content:
Before you start, here's a quick tour to show you how to navigate, use the menu and access useful features.
It won't take long!
tutorial-exit-button-aria-label: Close tutorial and continue to lesson
